import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import UserCard from '../util/UserCard' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './FollowBar.module.css' import FollowBtn from './FollowBtn' const FollowBar = ({profile}) => { const {auth} = useSelector(state=>state); const [isFollowing, setIsFollowing] = useState(true); return ( <>
setIsFollowing(!isFollowing)} className={styles.title}>{isFollowing ? ' Following ' : 'Followers'}
{isFollowing ? (!profile.user.following ? 0 : profile.user.following.length) : (!profile.user.followers ? 0 : profile.user.followers.length)}
{profile.user.following && profile.user.following.map(user =>
{user._id !== auth.user._id && (
console.log(user)} className={styles.btn_wrapper}>
)}
)}
{profile.user.followers && profile.user.followers.map(user =>
{user._id !== auth.user._id && (
console.log(user)} className={styles.btn_wrapper}>
)}
)}
) } export default FollowBar
